commentary: BMAJ Mendis to Amla, no run Given LBW! South Africa review. Amla looked happy to go but Faf talked him into reviewing. He tried to sweep and played over the top of it. Not bat involved. Amla is walking off already. Ball tracking says it pitched outside leg! That was always the query. It will be reversed. Amla has to walk back. Faf was correct. It pitched just outside leg. Only fractionally. It did look in doubt live but Amla thought it was out.
